children.markdown:
[![](https://i1.wp.com/static.flickr.com/26/54423942_588fd0f68f.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/54423942/ "photo sharing") [The new Lewsiham TK Maxx](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/54423942/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
I’m in the process of playing around with the beta of a neat little phone application called [ShoZu](http://www.shozu.com/portal/login.do), which allows you to post pictures straight from your mobile phone to Flickr. So far. I’m impressed. The picture is of workmen erecting a new fascia on the building that houses Lewisham’s new TK Maxx. I think it proves that just adding a plastic facade to an ugly building gives you an ugly building with a plastic facade.
